content.question: (1 comma negative 3.1) (2 comma 1.5) (3 comma 4) (4 comma 2.4) (5 comma negative 2.3) (6 comma negative 4) (7 comma negative 1.8) (8 comma 3.3) ​​Students in a science class are constructing a model for a data set.
